tutorials.title: Introduction to Labs and Workshops
tutorials.description: Introduction to Oracle Big Data Service

tutorials.title: Lab 1: Setting up the GitHub Environment and Installing the GitHub Desktop Client
tutorials.description: This lab walks you through the required and optional tasks to setup your Big Data Service environment before you can create clusters.

tutorials.title: Lab 2: Folder Structure
tutorials.description: This lab walks you through how to create a BDS Highly Available (HA) Hadoop cluster.

tutorials.title: Lab 3: Using Atom Editor to Develop Content
tutorials.description: This lab shows you how to develop your lab (markdown) content using an editor, such as **Atom** and starting the Atom Live Server.

tutorials.title: Lab 4: Perform GitHub Operations - Merge, Commit, Pull Request
tutorials.description: This lab shows you how to map a node's private IP address to a public IP address

tutorials.title: Lab 5:  Adding GitHub Hosted Labs to OHC
tutorials.description: This lab shows you how to use Cloudera Manager (CM) and Hue to access a Big Data Service (BDS) cluster.
